ARABIC: فَفَرَرْتُ مِنكُمْ لَمَّا خِفْتُكُمْ فَوَهَبَ لِى رَبِّى حُكْمًا وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and so I fled from you when I was in fear of you but my Lord gave me right judgement and made me one of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So I ran away from you out of fear. But my Lord has given me wisdom, and made me an apostle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then I fled for fear of you. Then my Lord bestowed wisdom and authority on me and made me one of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then I ran away from you in fear, but my Lord granted me the law and has appointed me as a Messenger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “I therefore went away from you as I feared you – so my Lord commanded me and appointed me as one of the Noble Messengers.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, I fled from you when I feared you. But my Lord has granted me Hukm, and made me one of the Messengers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So I fled from you when I feared you, then my Lord granted me wisdom and made me of the apostles;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: so I fled from you, fearing you. But my Lord gave me Judgment and made me one of the Envoys.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then I fled from you when I feared you, and my Lord vouchsafed me a command and appointed me (of the number) of those sent (by Him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and I fled from you because I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and made me one of the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then I fled from you when I feared you, and my Lord bestowed on me wisdom and made me one of the sent ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So I fled from you, as I was afraid of you. Then my Lord gave me sound judgement and made me one of the apostles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So I fled from you (all) when I feared you; but my Lord has (since) invested me with judgment (and wisdom) and appointed me as one of the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So I fled from you when I feared you. But my Lord has granted me Hukman (i.e. religious knowledge, right judgement of the affairs and Prophethood), and appointed me as one of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I fled from you because I feared you. But my Lord has given me judgment and made me one of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And I fled from you when I feared you; but my Lord gave me wisdom, and made me one of the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and prophethood and appointed me [as one] of the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:21] So I fled from you, as I was afraid of you. Then my Lord gave me judgement, knowledge, and made me one of the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then I fled from you when I feared you) when I feared that you would kill me, (and my Lord vouchsafed me a command) understanding, knowledge and prophethood (and appointed me (of the number) of those sent (by Him)) He made me a Messenger to you and to your people.
